main event: On June 4, 1958, two triangular or arrowhead-shaped objects were sighted in Cusick, Kentucky, observed for approximately 15 minutes.
interesting points: The objects were described as being approximately 6 inches in size., Each object was black and triangular or arrowhead in shape., The objects were reported to be stationary and hovering above ground level., No sound was heard during the observation., Witness is certain the objects were not aircraft or other known objects.
witness description: Civilian who observed the objects hovering approximately 50 yards away
